name: Teeth Whitening
description: Teeth whitening isn’t permanent. It can lasts up to 3 years – it varies from person to person. The whitening effect won’t last as long if you smoke or drink red wine, tea or coffee, which can all stain your teeth.

name: Root Canal
description: Root canal treatment (endodontics) is a dental procedure used to treat infection at the centre of a tooth. Root canal treatment is not painful and can save a tooth that might otherwise have to be removed completely.

name: Gum Treatment
description: In some cases of gum disease,root planing may be required.This is a deep clean under the gums that gets rid of bacteria from the roots of your teeth.Before having the treatment,you may need to have a local anaesthetic.

name: Teeth Cleaning
description: Most teeth cleanings are performed by a dental hygienist. Before the actual cleaning process begins, they start with a physical exam of your entire mouth.Teeth cleaning is part of oral hygiene

name: Dental Implants
description: Dental implants are replacement tooth roots. Implants provide a strong foundation for fixed (permanent) or removable replacement teeth that are made to match your natural teeth as it is your own.

name: Orthodontics
description: Orthodontics is a dentistry specialty that addresses the diagnosis, prevention, and correction of mal-positioned teeth and jaws, and misaligned bite patterns. It also address the modification of facial growth.
